metadata.title: CVE-2023-52071 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: tiny-curl-8_4_0 , curl-8_4_0 and curl-8_5_0 were discovered to contain anoff-by-one out-of-bounds array index via the component tool_cb_wrt.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
